cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.NI, cs.SY. 

This paper discusses a new architecture for blockchain nodes that scales linearly with available resources, which is a topic related to computer security (cs.CR) and distributed computing (cs.DC). The paper also discusses sharding, which is a technique used in distributed systems (cs.DS) and networking (cs.NI). Additionally, the paper evaluates block propagation and processing, which is a topic related to systems and control (cs.SY).
